original_text: And the beeves were thirty and six thousand; of which the Lord'S tribute was threescore and twelve.
korean_text: 소가 삼만 육천 마리라 그 중에서 여호와께 공물로 드린 것이 칠십이 마리요

sentences.original_text: And the beeves were thirty and six thousand
of which the Lord's tribute was threescore and twelve
sentences.korean_translation: 그 중에서 주의 몫은 칠십이 마리였습니다
